"A.P.239/5/10/11:00": "Did you get lost? There, there, it's alright now."
"...Hehe. No wonder they dislike you."
"It's obvious, isn't it? When we were Apprentice, we attacked this planet many times."
"ARKS, Lillipans, how much they suffered... Seeing their reactions, I know."
"It's not just that. Even the events on this planet are our fault!"
"You would have known. When we were monitoring it..."
"Umm, Yu-chan. Are you convinced?"
"Just because you got involved, you're hating yourself like this... blaming yourself."
"...That's right. It was unreasonable."
"But, it wasn't anyone's fault. Whether I desired it or not, it was a fact that I was Dark Falz."
"Aurora... Why are you afraid?"
"...! As if I'm afraid!"
"We're still linked. Even some emotions are transmitted."
"Are you scared that people will hate you?"
"...Of course I am. If you're hated, it's over. You'll only fall down."
"It was thanks to the people I liked, people I had, that I was able to stand there."
"I don't want to be hated. I wanted to be loved."
"That's right! Even [Profound Darkness], I don't know anything, nothing!"
"Even so, having everyone saying it's our fault! They hate us... They hate me!"
"That's why I responded... I didn't think it would become like this!"
"Everyone... Other than myself... where did they go?"
"They were called up by God, right? They're not the type to disappear easily! Seven Gods! Thirteen Goddesses! Where?!"
"To be up there... In order to go there, I've sacrificed everything!"
"Mai, Labyu, Floren, Roto! Nanaki! Tamu! ...Are they really dead?"
"I... didn't plan for this to happen, why... did it become like this?"
"Yu-chan... Am I bad? I'm not bad, right?"
"Please, tell me Yucreta. Both of us... We're not bad, right?"
"...You have to decide that for yourself."
